original: @154a / /rgya gar skad du /

analyzed: da sha tsakrakshi ti garbha n'a ma ma h'a ya na s'u tra /
translated: Daśacakrakṣitigarbha-nāma-mahāyānasūtra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'dus pa chen po las sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
analyzed: 'dus pa chen po las sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
translated: The Great Collection: The Ten Wheels of Kṣitigarbha, a Mahāyāna Sūtra

original: bam po dang po /
analyzed: bam po dang po /
translated: Volume One

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.

original: bcom ldan 'das ri kha la de ya zhes bya ba drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ri kha la de ya zhes bya ba drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas na /
translated: The Blessed One was dwelling on Mount Kailash, the domain of many sages and ascetics,

original: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
analyzed: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
translated: together with a great saṅgha of immeasurable and countless bhikṣus.

original: thams cad kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po sha stag go /
translated: They were all part of the great saṅgha of śrāvakas.

original: gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po sha stag ste; zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bshad ma thag tu /
analyzed: gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po sha stag ste; zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bshad ma thag tu /
translated: Moreover, there were bodhisattva mahāsattvas beyond measure and number, all of them great bodhisattva saṅghas, such as the one called Candragarbha.

original: de'i tshe lho phyogs nas bsung gi sprin chen po 'dus pa las bsung gi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo //
analyzed: de'i tshe lho phyogs nas bsung gi sprin chen po 'dus pa las bsung gi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo //
translated: At that time, from the south, a great cloud of fragrance gathered, and a great rain of fragrance fell.

original: me tog gi sprin @154b chen po 'dus pa las me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bab po //
analyzed: me tog gi sprin @154b chen po 'dus pa las me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bab po //
translated: A great cloud of flowers gathered, and a great rain of flowers fell.

original: rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi char chen po rab tu 'bab po; ;lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las lha rdzas kyi gos kyi char chen po rab tu 'bab
analyzed: rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi char chen po rab tu 'bab po; ;lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las lha rdzas kyi gos kyi char chen po rab tu 'bab
translated: A great cloud of precious divine ornaments gathered, and a great rain of precious divine ornaments fell. A great cloud of divine garments gathered, and a great rain of divine garments fell.

original: po // de lta bu'i sprin dang / char chen pos drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas kyi ri de la khyab par gyur to //
analyzed: po // de lta bu'i sprin dang / char chen pos drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas kyi ri de la khyab par gyur to //
translated: Such clouds and great rains pervaded the mountain where the sages practiced austerities.

original: bsung dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / gos de dag las chos chen po'i sgra dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong snyed grags par gyur pa ni; 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bsung dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / gos de dag las chos chen po'i sgra dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong snyed grags par gyur pa ni; 'di lta ste /
translated: From those fragrances, flowers, jeweled ornaments, and garments, various sounds of the great Dharma, in the hundreds of thousands of varieties, were heard, such as:

original: dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro ba'i sgra dang / bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa'i sgra dang / ngang des shing bzod pa can gyi sgra dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i sgra dang / bdud bzhi btul ba'i sgra dang / shes rab la gzhol zhing 'jug pa'i sgra dang /
analyzed: dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro ba'i sgra dang / bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa'i sgra dang / ngang des shing bzod pa can gyi sgra dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i sgra dang / bdud bzhi btul ba'i sgra dang / shes rab la gzhol zhing 'jug pa'i sgra dang /
translated: the sound of taking refuge in the Three Jewels, the sound of upholding the precepts, the sound of being gentle and patient, the sound of undertaking diligence, the sound of subduing the four māras, the sound of being inclined toward and engaging in wisdom,

original: grags pa chen pos 'jig rten gsum du rgya cher grags pa'i sgra dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang; gzungs kyi khyad par la nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /
analyzed: grags pa chen pos 'jig rten gsum du rgya cher grags pa'i sgra dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang; gzungs kyi khyad par la nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /
translated: the sound of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness,🔽the sound of being disgusted with desire,🔽the sound of “form is like a water bubble,”🔽the sound of “feeling is like a water bubble,”🔽the sound of “perception is like a mirage,”

original: 'dod chags kyis yongs su skyo ba'i sgra dang / gzugs mi chu'i lbu ba lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / 'du byed ni chu shing lta bu'o zhes @155a *//
analyzed: 'dod chags kyis yongs su skyo ba'i sgra dang / gzugs mi chu'i lbu ba lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / 'du byed ni chu shing lta bu'o zhes @155a *//
translated: the sound of “mental formations are like a plantain tree,”

original: pa'i sgra dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / mi rtag pa'i sgra dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra dang / stong pa'i sgra dang / 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha bar ldan pa'i sgra dang /
analyzed: pa'i sgra dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang / mi rtag pa'i sgra dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra dang / stong pa'i sgra dang / 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha bar ldan pa'i sgra dang /
translated: the sound of “consciousness is like an illusion,” the sound of “impermanence,” the sound of “suffering,” the sound of “no self,” the sound of “emptiness,” the sound of “shame and embarrassment,”

original: kun spong ba'i sgra dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sgra dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi sgra dang / chos kun chub pa'i sgra dang / mtho ris su skye ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra dang /
analyzed: kun spong ba'i sgra dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sgra dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi sgra dang / chos kun chub pa'i sgra dang / mtho ris su skye ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra dang /
translated: the sound of “abandoning all,” the sound of “the applications of mindfulness,” the sound of “love, compassion, joy, and equanimity,” the sound of “understanding all phenomena,” the sound of “being born in the higher realms,” the sound of “nirvāṇa,”🔽the sound of “the three vehicles,” the sound of “turning the wheel of the great Dharma,” the sound of “raining down the great Dharma,” the sound of “ripening beings,” the sound of “liberating from the three lower realms,”

original: theg pa gsum la 'bab pa'i sgra dang / chos chen po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i sgra dang; chos chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pa'i sgra dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang / ngan song gsum las yongs su sgrol ba'i sgra dang /
analyzed: theg pa gsum la 'bab pa'i sgra dang / chos chen po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i sgra dang; chos chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pa'i sgra dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang / ngan song gsum las yongs su sgrol ba'i sgra dang /
translated: and the sound of “the great Dharma.”

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang / thabs mkhas pa'i sgra dang / sa bcu 'bab pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rol ba'i sgra dang / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po rnam par rol pa'i sgra dang /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang / thabs mkhas pa'i sgra dang / sa bcu 'bab pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rol ba'i sgra dang / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po rnam par rol pa'i sgra dang /
translated: the sound of the practice of perfecting the six perfections, the sound of skill in means, the sound of descending to the ten levels, the sound of the display of the superknowledges, the sound of the display of the unsurpassed Mahāyāna,

original: sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i sgra dang / spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa'i sgra'i nga ro grags par gyur to //
analyzed: sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i sgra dang / spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa'i sgra'i nga ro grags par gyur to //
translated: the sound of irreversibility from the levels, the sound of the acceptance of the nonarising of dharmas, the sound of the consecration of the crown, and the sound of the great ocean of all buddhas.

original: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis de lta bu'i sprin dang / char rnam pa @155b sna tshogs mthong zhing de ltar chos kyi sgra'i nga ro'ang thos par gyur nas de dag gi so so'i yid ci la mos pa bzhin du so so'i lus la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bsung dang /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis de lta bu'i sprin dang / char rnam pa @155b sna tshogs mthong zhing de ltar chos kyi sgra'i nga ro'ang thos par gyur nas de dag gi so so'i yid ci la mos pa bzhin du so so'i lus la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bsung dang /
translated: At that time, all the many assemblies in the maṇḍala saw such clouds and various kinds of rain, and they heard the sound of the Dharma. According to their individual aspirations, they saw their bodies adorned with various kinds of fragrances,

original: me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dam pas yongs su brgyan par mthong ngo //
analyzed: me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dam pas yongs su brgyan par mthong ngo //
translated: flowers, precious ornaments, and divine, excellent garments.

original: yang so so'i lag mthil gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs shing yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de dag re re las kyang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab par mthong ngo //
analyzed: yang so so'i lag mthil gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs shing yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de dag re re las kyang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab par mthong ngo //
translated: They also saw a wish-fulfilling jewel in the palms of their hands, and from each of those wish-fulfilling jewels, various kinds of jewels rained down like rain.

original: gzhan yang / nor bu rin po che de dag las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs su byung ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang / nor bu rin po che de dag las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs su byung ste /
translated: Moreover, various kinds of light rays emerged from those precious jewels.

original: 'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sems can de dag so so nas phyogs bcu'i chu klung gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sems can de dag so so nas phyogs bcu'i chu klung gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong ngo //
translated: By the power of that light, each of those sentient beings saw as many buddha-fields as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River in the ten directions.

original: yang 'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de re re la'ang 'khor mang po tshad med pas bsti stang dang bcas te yongs su bskor bar mthong ngo //
analyzed: yang 'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de re re la'ang 'khor mang po tshad med pas bsti stang dang bcas te yongs su bskor bar mthong ngo //
translated: By the power of that light, they saw that in each of those buddha-fields, each Tathāgata was surrounded by an immeasurable assembly of followers who honored him.

original: gzhan yang / 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang nad kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu nad kyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur to //
analyzed: gzhan yang / 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang nad kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu nad kyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur to //
translated: Moreover, by the power of that light, all those sentient beings in those buddha-fields who were afflicted by illness were immediately freed from the suffering of illness as soon as they were touched by that light.

original: gang bsad pa la thug pa dang / btson du bzung zhing bcings pa dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu de dag las yongs su thar bar gyur to //
analyzed: gang bsad pa la thug pa dang / btson du bzung zhing bcings pa dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu de dag las yongs su thar bar gyur to //
translated: Those who were about to be killed, imprisoned, or bound were immediately freed from those situations as soon as they were touched by that light.

original: gang lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi bde bar spyod pa'i gnas ngan @156a *//
analyzed: gang lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi bde bar spyod pa'i gnas ngan @156a *//
translated: Those who were engaged in physical, verbal, and mental unwholesome actions,

original: len lci ba dag kyang 'od de'i dbang gis shin tu yang zhing rnam par dag par gyur to //
analyzed: len lci ba dag kyang 'od de'i dbang gis shin tu yang zhing rnam par dag par gyur to //
translated: and those who had committed grave offenses, became light and pure through the power of that light.

original: gang bkres shing skom pa dag kyang 'grangs shing ngoms par gyur to //
analyzed: gang bkres shing skom pa dag kyang 'grangs shing ngoms par gyur to //
translated: Those who were hungry and thirsty became satisfied.

original: gang gsad pa dang / chad pa sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu sdug bsngal ba dang bral bar gyur to //
analyzed: gang gsad pa dang / chad pa sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu sdug bsngal ba dang bral bar gyur to //
translated: Those who were afflicted by various killings and punishments were immediately freed from suffering upon being touched by that light.

original: gang bgo ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / dbyig dang / nor rdzas kyis brel cing phongs pa dag kyang bsams pa bzhin du 'byor cing ldan par gyur to //
analyzed: gang bgo ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / dbyig dang / nor rdzas kyis brel cing phongs pa dag kyang bsams pa bzhin du 'byor cing ldan par gyur to //
translated: Those who were in need of clothing, precious ornaments, gold, silver, and other valuables obtained them as they wished.

original: sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga' zhing mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du dga' zhing mos pa dag kyang 'od zer des reg ma thag tu srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du yongs🔽su spong ba la dga' zhing mos par gyur to //
analyzed: sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga' zhing mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du dga' zhing mos pa dag kyang 'od zer des reg ma thag tu srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos par gyur to //
translated: Those sentient beings who delighted in and were devoted to taking life, up to and were devoted to wrong views, as soon as they were touched by that light, delighted in and were devoted to abandoning taking life, up to and were devoted to abandoning wrong views.

original: sems can gang 'dod pa mi rnyed pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag kyang 'od zer des reg ma thag tu ji ltar re ba bzhin du rnyed par gyur to //
analyzed: sems can gang 'dod pa mi rnyed pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag kyang 'od zer des reg ma thag tu ji ltar re ba bzhin du rnyed par gyur to //
translated: Those sentient beings who were suffering from not getting the various things they wanted, as soon as they were touched by that light, got what they wanted.

original: gzhan yang / 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dag thams cad zhi nas rab tu bde ba dang ldan par mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzhan yang / 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dag thams cad zhi nas rab tu bde ba dang ldan par mthong ngo //
translated: Moreover, by the power of that light, all the sentient beings in all the buddha-fields who were tormented by suffering were seen to be pacified and to have become very happy.

original: gzhan yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du 'od kyis snang bar byas pas @156b sprin dang / rdul dang / na bun dang / rlung dang / rdzi char dang / bkra mi shis pa'i sgra dang / dri mi zhim pa dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du 'od kyis snang bar byas pas @156b sprin dang / rdul dang / na bun dang / rlung dang / rdzi char dang / bkra mi shis pa'i sgra dang / dri mi zhim pa dang /
translated: Moreover, since the light illuminated all those buddha-fields, the clouds, dust, mist, wind, rain, inauspicious sounds, and foul smells

original: kha ba dang / tsha ba la sogs pa'i ro ngan pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i reg bya dang / 'jigs skrag pa dang / gnod pa mang po rnams med par gyur to //
analyzed: kha ba dang / tsha ba la sogs pa'i ro ngan pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i reg bya dang / 'jigs skrag pa dang / gnod pa mang po rnams med par gyur to //
translated: and the unpleasant tastes such as cold and hot, the unpleasant tactile objects, and the many fears and harms were all eliminated.

original: gzhan yang / las ngan pa dang / log pa'i ngag dang / log pa'i bsam pa dang / log par phyogs pa dang yongs su bral te lhag par mi grang ba dang / lhag par mi tsha ba dang / rab tu zhi zhing bde ba dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang / las ngan pa dang / log pa'i ngag dang / log pa'i bsam pa dang / log par phyogs pa dang yongs su bral te lhag par mi grang ba dang / lhag par mi tsha ba dang / rab tu zhi zhing bde ba dang /
translated: Moreover, they were completely free from bad karma, wrong speech, wrong thoughts, and wrong directions. They were exceptionally not cold, not hot, very peaceful and happy,

original: sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang / bde ba'i yo byad dam pa thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar gyur to //
analyzed: sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang / bde ba'i yo byad dam pa thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar gyur to //
translated: and the ground was as even as the palm of one’s hand, completely filled with all the excellent articles of happiness.

original: de'i tshe na 'khor mang po rnams kyi so so'i lus kyi sa'i khams lhag par lci zhing mi theg pa tsam du gyur to //
analyzed: de'i tshe na 'khor mang po rnams kyi so so'i lus kyi sa'i khams lhag par lci zhing mi theg pa tsam du gyur to //
translated: At that time, the earth element in the bodies of the many beings in the assembly became heavy and unbearable.

original: ltas 'di lta bu gyur pa mthong nas thams cad kyang dngangs te de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltas 'di lta bur gyur snyam du rtog pa skyes so //
analyzed: ltas 'di lta bu gyur pa mthong nas thams cad kyang dngangs te de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltas 'di lta bur gyur snyam du rtog pa skyes so //
translated: Seeing this kind of omen, everyone was frightened and wondered, “What is the cause and what is the condition for this kind of omen to occur?”

original: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na brgya byin lha'i dbang bo dri ma med par skyes zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug pa las langs nas /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na brgya byin lha'i dbang bo dri ma med par skyes zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug pa las langs nas /
translated: At that time, in the middle of the assembly, there was the lord of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, called Stainless Birth. He was not far from the Bhagavān. He rose from his seat,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te /
translated: bowed his head to the Bhagavān’s feet,

original: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: and with palms joined in the direction of the Bhagavān, he spoke this verse:

original: bden par gsung zhing bden gzigs pa //
analyzed: bden par gsung zhing bden gzigs pa //
translated: “You who speak the truth and see the truth,

original: bden la rab gnas thub pa @157a *//
analyzed: bden la rab gnas thub pa @157a *//
translated: Sage, who is well established in the truth,

original: khyod; ;'dus pa'i 'khor mang thams cad la //
analyzed: khyod; ;'dus pa'i 'khor mang thams cad la //
translated: for the sake of this great assembly

original: mthar phyin bden pa'i chos gsungs shig /
analyzed: mthar phyin bden pa'i chos gsungs shig /
translated: Please teach the truth that brings perfection.

original: so so'i skye bo mang po dag /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo mang po dag /
translated: Many ordinary beings

original: sdug bsngal rgyu dang sdug bsngal sel //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rgyu dang sdug bsngal sel //
translated: Are the causes of suffering and the dispellers of suffering.

original: ci yi slad du 'khor 'dir ni //

analyzed: tshong ba mang po'i rin po che'i gling lta bu'o //

analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing skye ba'i phyir zhing gshin pa lta bu'o //

analyzed: rin po che dam pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyir yon tan gyi bum pa bzang po lta bu'o //

analyzed: dge ba'i nan tan can la snang bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma gsal ba lta bu'o //

analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'i phyir zla ba ltar sim pa lta bu'o //

analyzed: nad kyis gzir ba la sman pa mkhas pa dang phrad pa lta bu'o //

analyzed: rgas shing 'khogs pa la brten dang / 'khar ba lta bu'o //

analyzed: ngal ba dang / dub pa la khyi dang / stan lta bu'o //

analyzed: chu bo bzhi rgal ba la zam pa lta bu'o; ;pha rol tu 'gro ba la gru dang / gzings lta bu'o //

analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa rnam gsum gyi 'bras bu khyad par can smin par byed pa'o //

analyzed: dge ba rnam gsum gyi gzhi 'dren cing rgyun @158b du 'bebs pa'o //

analyzed: sbyin pa gtong ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa 'khor lo ltar 'jug pa'o //

analyzed: tshul khrims srung ba brtan pas ri rab lhun po lta bu'o //

analyzed: brtson 'grus gzhig par dka' ba na rdo rje /

original: rin po che lta bu'o //
analyzed: rin po che lta bu'o //

original: bzod pa mi g-yo ba ni sa chen po lta bu'o //
analyzed: bzod pa mi g-yo ba ni sa chen po lta bu'o //

analyzed: bsam gtan zab pa ni gter gsang ba lta bu'o //

analyzed: mnyam par 'jog pas mdzes pa ni me tog gi phreng ba lta bu'o //

analyzed: shes rab zab cing yangs pa ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o //

analyzed: cis kyang mi chags pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //

analyzed: 'bras bu dam pa'i rgyu dang nye ba ni me tog rgyas pa lta bu'o //

analyzed: mu stegs can 'dul ba la seng ge'i rgyal po lta bu'o //

analyzed: lha'i bdud yongs su 'joms pa ni klu'am /

analyzed: glang po che lta bu'o //

analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad gcod pa ni lha'i ral gri lta bu'o //

analyzed: 'du 'dzi mang pos skyo ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa lta bu'o //

analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru ba ni chu dang pa lta bu'o //

analyzed: mi gtsang ba 'i nyal nyil sel ba ni rlung drag po lta bu'o //
translated: In removing the filth of the impurities, it is like a strong wind.

analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pas glags mi gcod pa ni mtshon rnon po lta bu'o //

analyzed: 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba kun las srung ba ni gnyen nam /

analyzed: mdza' bo lta bu'o //

analyzed: phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra las skyob pa ni 'obs sam /

original: mkhar lta bu'o //
analyzed: mkhar lta bu'o //

analyzed: nyan nga ba thams cad las grol bar byed pas pha ma lta bu'o //

analyzed: zhan cings nyam chung rnams sbed pa ni nags stug po lta bu'o //

analyzed: tsha ba dang / skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la cha grang lta bu'o //

analyzed: bkres pa rnams la 'bras bu zhim po lta bu'o //

analyzed: gcer bu rnams la bgo ba'i gos byed pa'o //

original: tshe bas nyen pa rnams la sprin stug por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: tshe bas nyen pa rnams la sprin stug por gyur pa'o //
translated: It is a thick cloud for those in danger of dying.

analyzed: dbul phongs pa la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po cher gyur pa'o //

analyzed: 'jigs skrag pa dag la skyabs dang / gnas su gyur pa'o //

original: lo tog rnams la char par gyur ba'o //
analyzed: lo tog rnams la char par gyur ba'o //

analyzed: chu rnyog ma can rnams nor bu chu dang du gyur pa'o //
translated: It is a water-purifying gem for muddy water.

analyzed: sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'gong bar byed pas spyod yul dam pa ston cing 'khor spro ba dang / tshim par byed pa'o //

analyzed: sems can rnams lhag pa'i 'dzam pa dang / ngo tsha ba la bskul zhing 'dzud pa'o //

analyzed: bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs gsog pa la de'i rgyan dang ldan par byed pa'o //

analyzed: nyon mongs pa yongs su sel ba la skyug pa dang / 'khru pa'i sman lta bur gyur pa'o //

analyzed: sems 'khrugs pa sdud pa ni mnyam par 'jog pa'i spyod yul lta bur gyur pa'o //

analyzed: spobs pa thogs pa med pa ni zo chun rgyud pa'i 'khor lo lta bu'o //
translated: It is like a waterwheel in order to have unimpeded eloquence.

analyzed: dmigs pa la sems sdug pa ni gzugs bzang po la rtog pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like contemplating a beautiful form in order to delight the mind in its object.

original: bzod pa brtan pa ni ri rab lhun po lta bu'o //
analyzed: bzod pa brtan pa ni ri rab lhun po lta bu'o //
translated: It is like Mount Meru in order to have stable patience.

original: gzugs zab cing rgya che ba ni rgya @159b mtsho chen po lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzugs zab cing rgya che ba ni rgya @159b mtsho chen po lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the great ocean in order to have profound and vast forms.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thogs pa med pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thogs pa med pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: It is like space in order to have unimpeded bases of miraculous powers.

analyzed: sgrib pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su sel ba ni ji ltar nyi ma tsha bas 'khyag pa cha mtshon /

analyzed: bzhu ba lta bu'o //

analyzed: rtag tu bas ma gtan dang / gzugs med pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la rol cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che'i dam pa'i gling lta bur gyur pas ched du ma brtsams kyang chos chen po'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro //
translated: Without any effort, the great Dharma wheel is turned.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

translated: In order to listen to the sublime Dharma, he remained in the presence of the Bhagavān without speaking.

original: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te /
translated: At that time, all the members of the assembly gathered in that maṇḍala, upon seeing the bodhisattva mahāsattva Kṣitigarbha, were amazed.

original: so so nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rdzas kyi spos dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang // na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs la sogs pa phul te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: so so nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rdzas kyi spos dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang // na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs la sogs pa phul te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Each of them offered various divine substances of incense, flowers, precious ornaments, clothing, victory banners, flags, parasols, and so forth, making offerings to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Kṣitigarbha. Having made offerings, they said this:

original: @162b bdag cag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do //
analyzed: @162b bdag cag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do //
translated: We have obtained the best of gains!

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mngon sum du skyes bu chen po khyod mthong nas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas par gyur to /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mngon sum du skyes bu chen po khyod mthong nas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas par gyur to /
translated: Through the Bhagavān's blessing, we have directly seen you, the great being, and have made offerings with respect.

original: zhes smra'o // de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs par the tshom 'dri zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa stan las langs nas gos tshags bcos te phrag pa g-yas pa phyung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag🔽btsal nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
analyzed: zhes smra'o // de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs par the tshom 'dri zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa stan las langs nas gos tshags bcos te phrag pa g-yas pa phyung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
translated: Then, in that assembly, the bodhisattva mahāsattva named Logical Doubt arose from his seat, adjusted his upper robe on one shoulder, and with his right knee touching the ground,🔽he bowed his head to the feet of the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: With palms joined, he faced the Blessed One and said this to him:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rigs kyi bu 'di gang nas mchis /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'di gang nas mchis /
translated: from where has this son of noble family come?

original: gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na /
analyzed: gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na /
translated: In this buddha field where he dwells,

original: ji srid cig na mchis /
analyzed: ji srid cig na mchis /
translated: how long has he been here?

original: yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig dang ldan na bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsngags la phyir yang bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyi khyab pa la mngon par bstod par gyur /
analyzed: yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig dang ldan na bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsngags la phyir yang bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyi khyab pa la mngon par bstod par gyur /
translated: With how many qualities and roots of virtue is one endowed that the Blessed One praises with various kinds of praise, and then again praises the Blessed One's fathomless ocean of qualities?

original: bdag cag gis sngon ma mthong bas ngo mtshar du'i gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bshad du gsol //
analyzed: bdag cag gis sngon ma mthong bas ngo mtshar du'i gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bshad du gsol //
translated: Since we have never seen this before, we are amazed. Please explain to us, Blessed One!

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rigs kyi bu /🔽thongs shig / skyes bu chen po 'di'i yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam pa de 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang / mi'i 'khor thams cad @163a *//
analyzed: rigs kyi bu / thongs shig / skyes bu chen po 'di'i yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam pa de 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang / mi'i 'khor thams cad @163a *//
translated: Son of noble family,

original: kyis rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: kyis rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: let go! The extent of this great being's qualities and roots of virtue cannot be fathomed by the entire assembly of gods and humans in the world.

original: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par bshad na 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang / mi thams cad kyi mgo rmongs te yid mi ches par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par bshad na 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang / mi thams cad kyi mgo rmongs te yid mi ches par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the Tathāgata were to explain in detail the good qualities and roots of virtue of this great being, all the gods and humans in the world would be confused and would not believe it.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rigs par the tshom 'dri bas yang gsol pa /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rigs par the tshom 'dri bas yang gsol pa /
translated: Then the bodhisattva Viśeṣamati asked,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Bhagavān,

original: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bshad du gsol //
analyzed: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bshad du gsol //
translated: please explain out of compassion for us.🔽”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān said,

original: legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas khyod la phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas khyod la phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o //
translated: “Listen well and keep this in mind. I will explain a little to you.

original: ji ltar skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no //
analyzed: ji ltar skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no //
translated: How is it that this great being possesses immeasurable and inconceivable special qualities?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this.

original: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyi khyad par la bde bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyi khyad par la bde bar gnas pa'o //
translated: He abides happily in the special samādhi called ‘heroic progress.’

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lnga shin tu rtogs par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lnga shin tu rtogs par 'jug pa'o //
translated: and the fifth is to enter into the realization of the domain of the Tathāgata.

original: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i khyad par yang thob pa'o //
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i khyad par yang thob pa'o //
translated: “He attains the special tolerance of the nonorigination of all things.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa'o //
translated: He has mastery over all the qualities of the Buddha.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sa la bzod pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sa la bzod pa thob pa'o //
translated: He attains the tolerance of the stage of the knowledge of the Omniscient One.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: He has gone to the other side of the ocean of the knowledge of the Omniscient One.

original: seng ge rab tu bsgyings pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ting 'dzin la'ang shin tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: seng ge rab tu bsgyings pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ting 'dzin la'ang shin tu gnas pa'o //
translated: He is well established in the concentration called the banner of the lion’s valor.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ri la'ang rab tu 'dzegs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ri la'ang rab tu 'dzegs pa'o //
translated: He has climbed to the mountain peak of the knowledge of the Omniscient One.

original: mu @163b stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshoms pa ste /
analyzed: mu @163b stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshoms pa ste /
translated: He has crushed all the extremists and all the adversaries.

original: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa thams cad du de gnas par byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa thams cad du de gnas par byed do //
translated: He remains in all the buddhafields in order to ripen all living beings.

original: skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du gnas te /
analyzed: skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du gnas te /
translated: The Buddha-fields are as the great man is.

original: gang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par skyed par gyur pas gdul ba'i sems can tshad med pa dag yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: gang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par skyed par gyur pas gdul ba'i sems can tshad med pa dag yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: The great man, by the power of his meditation, produces immeasurable special qualities and thereby ripens immeasurable beings.

original: skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: The Buddha-fields are as the great man is.

original: gal te ye shes mngon par skyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad mthun par ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi spyod yul kun mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te ye shes mngon par skyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad mthun par ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi spyod yul kun mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If he enters the concentration called Production of Knowledge, by the power of that concentration all the beings in that Buddha-field, in agreement, will see the range of the concentrations.

original: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: The Buddha-fields are as the great man is.

original: gal te dpag tu med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ci nus pa bzhin du tshad med pa'i yo byad dam pas
analyzed: gal te dpag tu med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ci nus pa bzhin du tshad med pa'i yo byad dam pas
translated: If he enters the concentration called endowed with immeasurable wisdom, then through the power of that concentration all the sentient beings living in that buddha field are satisfied with whatever they need.🔽

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur ro //🔽ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de @164a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur ro // ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de @164a *//
translated: If he enters the samadhi called “endowed with immeasurable wisdom,” then by the power of that samadhi all the sentient beings who dwell in that buddha realm will make offerings to that Bhagavat Buddha with immeasurable, excellent articles, according to their ability.

original: bzhin du 'gyur te /🔽gal te rnam par dag pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyis mthun par 'dod pa'i spyod yul gyi nyes pa'i
analyzed: bzhin du 'gyur te / gal te rnam par dag pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyis mthun par 'dod pa'i spyod yul gyi nyes pa'i
translated: And the buddha realms will become like that.

original: skyon tshad med pa mthong nas sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyon tshad med pa mthong nas sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: If he enters the samadhi called “perfect, pure wisdom,” then by the power of that samadhi all the sentient beings who dwell in those buddha realms will see the faults of the objects of desire as immeasurable and their minds will become pure.

original: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: In accordance with how he abides, the buddha realms will be like that.

original: gal te khrel ba dang / ngo cha ba dang ldan pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad lhag pa'i 'dzem pa dang /
analyzed: gal te khrel ba dang / ngo cha ba dang ldan pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad lhag pa'i 'dzem pa dang /
translated: If he enters into the meditative absorption called “wisdom endowed with shame and embarrassment,” through the power of that meditative absorption all the sentient beings dwelling in those buddha realms will be endowed with shame and embarrassment,

original: ngo tsha ba dang ldan zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos dang yongs su bral nas bsam pa mi nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngo tsha ba dang ldan zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos dang yongs su bral nas bsam pa mi nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: will be completely free from negative, non-virtuous phenomena, and their intentions will not deteriorate.🔽In accordance with how he abides, the buddha realms will be like that.

original: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te; gal te theg pa thams cad dang ldan pa bsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can
analyzed: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te; gal te theg pa thams cad dang ldan pa bsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can
translated: If he enters into the meditative absorption called “eliminating all vehicles,” in those buddha realms the sentient beings dwelling there

original: thams cad thangs mkhas pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba mngon par shes pa dang / @164b 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi rgyu dang /
analyzed: thams cad thangs mkhas pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba mngon par shes pa dang / @164b 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi rgyu dang /
translated: They all had the supernormal knowledge of the eye of the magical power of wisdom, the supernormal knowledge of the recollection of past lives, the supernormal knowledge of death and rebirth, and the supernormal knowledge of the causes of this world and the next world.🔽

original: 'bras bu mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro //🔽de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te; ;gal te mya ngan med pa'i mngon par shes pas rig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
analyzed: 'bras bu mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro // de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te; ;gal te mya ngan med pa'i mngon par shes pas rig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
translated: “They will have the supernormal knowledge of the eye of wisdom, the supernormal knowledge of the recollection of past lives, the supernormal knowledge of death and rebirth, and the supernormal knowledge of the causes and effects of this world and the next.

original: dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad mya ngan dang / yi mug pa dang / rmugs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad mya ngan dang / yi mug pa dang / rmugs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “They will know the buddhafields as they are. If they enter the meditative absorption called ‘knowledge through the supernormal knowledge of the absence of sorrow,’ through the power of that meditative absorption all the sentient beings who are in those buddhafields will be free from all sorrow, depression, and dullness.

original: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: And the buddha-fields will be like that, just as they are.

original: gal te mngon par shes pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na /
analyzed: gal te mngon par shes pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na /
translated: If he enters the concentration called “endowed with the special higher knowledges,”

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad thabs mkhas pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad thabs mkhas pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: then all the sentient beings living in those buddha-fields will become endowed with the higher knowledges and skillful means.

original: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: And the buddha-fields will be like that, just as they are.

original: gal te 'jig rten kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mun pa dang bral te /
analyzed: gal te 'jig rten kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mun pa dang bral te /
translated: If he enters the concentration called “illuminating the whole world,” then by the power of that concentration all the world-realms in the ten directions will be free from darkness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And all those living in that buddha-field will see all the buddha-fields in the ten directions face to face.

original: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de @165a *//🔽bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de @165a *// bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: Just as it is, so are the buddhafields.

original: gal te sangs rgyas kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad log par lta ba yongs su spangs nas /
analyzed: gal te sangs rgyas kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad log par lta ba yongs su spangs nas /
translated: If he enters the meditative absorption called “Buddha’s Lamp,” then by the power of that meditative absorption all the sentient beings living in those buddhafields will give up wrong views

original: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and go for refuge to the Three Jewels.

original: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: Just as it is, so are the buddhafields.

original: gal te rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi ri khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / ri rab lhun po dang / de ma yin pa'i ri gzhan dang /
analyzed: gal te rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi ri khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / ri rab lhun po dang / de ma yin pa'i ri gzhan dang /

translated: If he enters the absorption called the power of wisdom that is difficult to tame, by the power of that absorption all the māra kings dwelling in that buddha realm, together with their retinues, will be terrified.

analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro //

translated: If he becomes absorbed in the concentration called “lightning-rays of light,” then by the power of that concentration all the sentient beings living in those buddha-fields will be free from the fear of the next world and will be inspired with the Dharma.

translated: If he enters the meditative absorption called “gathering all merits,” then by the power of that meditative absorption all those buddhafields will be completely free from strife, conflict, disease, and famine.

analyzed: so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rigs la nyon mongs pa shin tu sra ba rdo rje lta bu dag bsal nas ci la mos pa bzhin du so sor bkod do //
translated: Having dispelled the afflictions that are like a diamond for all ordinary beings, he has established them individually according to their inclinations.

original: mthu dang ldan pa'i sems can dag ni theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog par yang mdzad do //
analyzed: mthu dang ldan pa'i sems can dag ni theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog par yang mdzad do //
translated: He has also made powerful beings irreversible from the three vehicles.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

original: 'di @184b lta ste /
analyzed: 'di @184b lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: yul kha cig tu srid med par 'gyur ba na de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad bdag gi dmag dang / gzhan gyi dmag gis yongs su gtses shing nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur te /
analyzed: yul kha cig tu srid med par 'gyur ba na de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad bdag gi dmag dang / gzhan gyi dmag gis yongs su gtses shing nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur te /

original: brdzun du smra ba dang / g-yo sgyu dang; tshig rtsub par smra ba dang / skur klad 'debs shing 'khrugs pa dang / dmus long dang / ling tog can du 'gyur ba dang / nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang / grang ba dang; tsha ba'i nad ma rungs pa dang /
analyzed: brdzun du smra ba dang / g-yo sgyu dang; tshig rtsub par smra ba dang / skur klad 'debs shing 'khrugs pa dang / dmus long dang / ling tog can du 'gyur ba dang / nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang / grang ba dang; tsha ba'i nad ma rungs pa dang /

analyzed: ri mus rnam pa mang po dang / smyo ba dang / skem byed dang / kha zas mi 'ju ba dang / sems 'khrug cing myos pa dang / dbang po ma tshang zhing yan lag dang / nying lag nyams pa dang / bgo ba dang /

analyzed: bza' ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phongs shing brel te /

analyzed: yang dag pa'i lam stor nas ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ba na /

analyzed: mang du thos pa /

analyzed: beed'urya la sogs pa tshad med pa snyed thogs te rgyal po de la phul lo // gzhan yang / rigs mtho zhing btsun pa / tshangs par spyod pa /

analyzed: bkra shis pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rgyal po'i spyi bor gtor to //

analyzed: drang ba / g-yo med pa /

analyzed: mdzangs pa dag kyang ci rigs su blon por rim par phye ste bcug nas /

translated: The king’s work was to eliminate all the harm caused by the armies of himself and others in that country, all the enemies and bad friends, and to pacify all the hostile enemies and harm-doers.

analyzed: nag po'i phyogs thams cad byang zhing rnam par dkar ba'i phyogs thams cad skyes te 'phel bar gyur to //

analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po de lta bu'i 'khor lo gcig dang ldan na /

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family!

analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs nas gti mug gis ldongs te /

translated: They are afflicted by the various sicknesses of afflictions and are blinded to the eye of the true Dharma.

analyzed: zhe sdang dang / khong khro bas gdungs shing 'khrugs kyang yang dag pa bden pa'i chos cung zad kyang yid la mi byed de /

analyzed: yang dag pa'i chos kyi ro yongs su gtang nas dge ba byed pa la dbang za zhing smod de //

analyzed: de sngar bde zhing skyid pas ni bral cing phongs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: They will be separated from previous happiness and comfort and will become destitute.

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam las phyir log cing ngan song gsum las gzhol bar 'gyur to //

analyzed: de'i tshe zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems @187a *//

analyzed: dpa' chen po sngon sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la mchod cing pa snyen bkur byas pa /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa /

analyzed: khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na sbyin pa tshad med pa la nan tan byas pa dang / tshul khrims rab tu bsrungs pa dang / shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de /
translated: ‘In the past, you diligently practiced immeasurable generosity, guarded morality, and engaged in difficult practices through extremely strenuous effort.

original: thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms so //

translated: The wheel of activity of the householder is the one by which those who build houses and fields

analyzed: de ltar shin tu brtags pas las dang / chos rnams kyi rgyu dang / 'bras bu rab tu mkhyen te /
